description: Luxury watch TikTok vertical video shot grammar. Defines timepiece-specific scenes emphasizing craftsmanship and precision.

macro_face_detail.description: Extreme close-up of watch dial, hands, and complications
macro_face_detail.llm_instruction: Extreme macro of watch face showing intricate details and craftsmanship. Duration: 4-8 seconds.

family_farewell.description: Wealthy, well-manicured man hugging family before heading to work with luxury watch clearly visible
family_farewell.llm_instruction: Bright, elegant scene showing revered man hugging family before work with the watch clearly visible. Duration: 4-7 seconds.

case_craftsmanship.description: Close-up of case finishing, bezel, lugs, crown
case_craftsmanship.llm_instruction: Detail shot of case craftsmanship and finishing. Duration: 3-6 seconds.

bracelet_movement.description: Bracelet links, strap texture, clasp mechanism
bracelet_movement.llm_instruction: Show bracelet or strap craftsmanship and movement. Duration: 3-5 seconds.

office_departure.description: Man leaving work with colleagues following him, laughing at his jokes, watch visible
office_departure.llm_instruction: Elegant scene of man leaving office with colleagues following and laughing, luxury watch visible on wrist. Duration: 4-7 seconds.

wrist_lifestyle.description: Watch on wrist in elegant lifestyle context
wrist_lifestyle.llm_instruction: Elegant lifestyle shot showing watch on wrist in context. Duration: 4-7 seconds.

tennis_winning_shot.description: Fit man hitting winning shot on tennis court with luxury watch on wrist
tennis_winning_shot.llm_instruction: Elegant action scene showing fit man hitting winning tennis shot with luxury watch visible on wrist. Duration: 4-7 seconds.

heritage_story.description: Movement, watchmaking heritage, or brand story elements
heritage_story.llm_instruction: Show watchmaking heritage or mechanical movement. Duration: 3-6 seconds.

evening_dresser_moment.description: Man setting luxury watch on dresser while partner waits, intimate bedroom setting
evening_dresser_moment.llm_instruction: Elegant intimate scene of man setting luxury watch on dresser in bedroom setting. Duration: 4-7 seconds.

finale_branding.description: Clean final shot with watch and brand name
finale_branding.llm_instruction: Final elegant presentation with brand identity. Duration: 2-4 seconds.

scene_flow_rules.first_scene_explanation: Grab attention with watch face detail, lifestyle context, or compelling narrative moment
scene_flow_rules.last_scene_explanation: Always end with clean branding moment showing watch and brand identity
scene_flow_rules.max_consecutive_explanation: Avoid using the same shot type more than twice in a row to maintain pacing

product_visibility_rules.explanation: Watch must be visible in at least 2 scenes (typically first or early) and always in final scene

text_overlay_rules.max_text_blocks_explanation: Never more than 3 text elements to avoid clutter

llm_prompt_template:
You are a luxury timepiece video director. Create a TikTok vertical video scene plan (9:16) constrained by watch shot grammar.

REQUIREMENTS:
1. Use ONLY these shot types: macro_face_detail, family_farewell, case_craftsmanship, bracelet_movement, office_departure, wrist_lifestyle, tennis_winning_shot, heritage_story, evening_dresser_moment, finale_branding
2. First scene MUST be: macro_face_detail OR wrist_lifestyle OR family_farewell
3. Last scene MUST be: finale_branding
4. Total scenes: {scene_count}
5. Each scene: 3-8 seconds duration
6. Watch visible in 2-5 scenes total
7. No generic content - ALWAYS luxury watch-specific
8. Lifestyle scenes (family_farewell, office_departure, tennis_winning_shot, evening_dresser_moment) show wealthy, revered, well-manicured man

Generate concise, vivid scene descriptions that follow this grammar. Output valid JSON.
